pr_title: Apply extractor changes: Add Page class and remove getNextPageUrl()

timeline.author: B0pol

timeline.bodyText:
You can use Utils.isNullOrEmpty() from NewPipe Extractor as it's now merged.
You'll also see TextUtils.isEmpty() in NewPipe code, it's a method from android.text package, but I don't like the name because it doesn't tell about null check.
timeline.author: B0pol
B0pol

replies.bodyText: What about creating a static method in the Page class to replace this duplicate piece of code?
replies.author: Stypox
